title: My League of Legends login screen doesn't appare.WHY ?????
body:
Hello Guys.One day ago i was reinstalling my Windows (Windows 7), an I was playing League of Legends.Next day i wanted to play League of Legends,but my login screen doesn't appare{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}.Someone HELP ME PLEASE!!!!
I NEED HELP PLEASE

replies.body: I'm here to help!  If pressing Launch doesn't yield the login screen, then there could be a security setting blocking the patcher.  I suggest going through our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make sure the patcher has access to launch and scan game files.  Let me know if you have any issues afterwards.
